entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 02:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -7.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -12.5°C
Wind: WSW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then flurries beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
